name: Rock Paper Shotgun!
description:
Synopsis

Have a night stroll through the city streets. Fight wandering ghost with your rock-paper-scissors skills. Having bad luck? Grab your shotgun and sShoot'em before they eat your soul!

Missing

  • Shotgun animation & flash screen
  • Sfx & Music
  • Ghost eating you

Some crucial points missing, will see if I can upload new versions :F

Produced for

MiniJam 117 - Ghost, Limitation: Shotgun as a Mechanic

Credits

  • Music: N/A
  • SFX: N/A
  • Visuals: Kenney assets <3

Made with

  • 12 hours & Unity, Aseprite, VS :)
